duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate and enhance client relationships and service capabilities between clients and financial advisors.
Resolve client inquiries and maintain key information up to date using various tech tools in a mostly digital/paperless office.
Perform administrative duties to support Financial Advisors, including phone coverage, coordination of client meetings, CRM maintenance, and new account opening.
Assist in servicing clients, preparing financial plans, conducting investment research, and completing trades, transactions, wires, ACH, and more.
Support the team's marketing strategy by maintaining marketing materials, planning and running client events, and submitting both front & back-end compliance forms.

education_certification.credential: College degree and 5 years of admin & industry experience preferred. Excellent interpersonal skills and outgoing personality a big plus. Great organization and time management skills. Background check.
